messages.subject: OT:  Tales of the Otori
messages.msgSnippet: I think I posted about this back on the miburo list...but I ll be redundant as usual...it may be made into a live action film...I ve heard so many good things
messages.messageBody:
I think I posted about this back on the miburo list...but I'll be
redundant as usual...it may be made into a live action film...I've
heard so many good things about this series but then again some people
say it is Harry Potter in the warring states period Japan

http://www.theotori.com/bookgeneral/default.asp
